amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds from being paid as bonuses to employees in the Senior Executive Service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay a performance award under section 5384 of title 5, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Stearns.
